room_title: Escape room "Biohazard" by DeadLocked Escape Rooms in Stamford
room_description:
Your team was lured here by the eccentric Dr. Hope, a brilliant but strange bioscientist with a reputation for stopping at nothing to develop his new, alarming gene therapies. It was whispered that he secretly used human subjects that had not agreed to be guinea pigs. Arriving at the conference, he invited you all to tour his lab.

As your team enters his bio lab, the door slams behind you. You and your colleagues have one hour to escape the lab before all of you are subject to the potentially deadly mist that will fill the room and alter your genes in ways we can only imagine!
